did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Resource package for a 1989 teleconference on AIDS in the college community and flyers, handouts, and reprints relating to HIV infection and AIDS, distributed by the Cornell AIDS Program at a workshop in Olin Library in 1992.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Resource package for a 1989 teleconference on AIDS in the college community and flyers, handouts, and reprints relating to HIV infection and AIDS, distributed by the Cornell AIDS Program at a workshop in Olin Library in 1992.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell AIDS Program publications, #51-1-2633. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
